mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT name,sregion,lat,lnt FROM acmd s JOIN (SELECT SUM(JAN+FEB+MAR+APR+MAY+JUN+JUL+AUG+SEP+OCT+NOV+DEC) as total,no FROM acmd_pop GROUP BY NO) p ON s.no=p.no WHERE sregion=#{region} ORDER BY total desc) WHERE rownum =1
